remarks: Calculate the reduced form of a quotient using ` gcd ` .  This version extends ~ divnumden for the negative integers.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Oct-2017.)
statement: divnumden2 $p |- ( ( A e. ZZ /\ B e. ZZ /\ -u B e. NN ) -> ( ( numer ` ( A / B ) ) = -u ( A / ( A gcd B ) ) /\ ( denom ` ( A / B ) ) = -u ( B / ( A gcd B ) ) ) ) $.
